page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS-ANSTEY
page.content: The Parish Council would like a {Health Centre}in Anstey, but can't get enough doctors to start one. Anstey Latimer School is to hold a fete to raise money for a{new mini {bus. {The Conservatives}retained their Bradgate Division seat on the County Council with a slightly reduced majority in May 1985. {St. Mary's Church}Anstey needs Â£30,000 to restore it's decaying roof. On May 6th 1985 St,Mary's held a fete. They have raised Â£10,000 so far. The church was built in Saxon times. {A Beavers pack}started in Anstey with 18 boys. To be a Beaver you have to be 5 years old. {The Bradgate Twinning Ass.}is twinned with Plateau Est de Rouen and local people enjoyed visiting France.
